channel.description: Recent content in all on Opde Issues Tracker

item.title: compile.23
item.description: build number: 23 re-implement command docker pull immortalwrt/opde:sdk docker run -it --rm immortalwrt/opde:sdk zsh # or bash export http_proxy= # [your proxy], do not use localhost or 127.0.0.1 export https_proxy=$http_proxy opde feeds && opde config -a make package/feeds/packages/poco/compile -j$(nproc) || make package/feeds/packages/poco/compile V=s Compile.txt Applying ./patches/100-configure.patch using plaintext: patching file configure Applying ./patches/200-strerror.patch using plaintext: patching file Foundation/src/Error.cpp Configured for Linux make[4]: Entering directory '/openwrt/build_dir/target-aarch64_cortex-a53_musl/poco-all/poco-1.11.0-all' make -C /openwrt/build_dir/target-aarch64_cortex-a53_musl/poco-all/poco-1.11.0-all/Foundation make[5]: Entering directory '/openwrt/build_dir/target-aarch64_cortex-a53_musl/poco-all/poco-1.
